author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: American Bitcoin, Backed by Eric and Donald Trump Jr, Pulls In $220M to Accumulate BTC
description: The company said $10 million of the total amount raised came in the form of bitcoin, at a rate of $104,000 per BTC.
content: American Bitcoin Corp, a Miami-based mining company majority owned by Hut 8 (HUT) and backed by the Trump family, has raised $220 million from accredited investors, according to a filing with the U.S… [+886 chars]
